MigMod 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Eurostat migration data

    mig_data.Rd

    These data sets have been downloaded from: the publicly available Eurostat data base on population: https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/main/data/database, data bases 'migr' and 'demo'.

    • These are migration statistics for selected EU countries, and population sizes. The data relate to 2010-2019 period.

    • Shiny app made by Maciej Jan Dańko: https://maciej-jan-danko.shinyapps.io/HMigD_Shiny_App_I/, These data contain the assumed accuracy of the data sources.

    • Shiny app made by Maciej Jan Dańko: https://maciej-jan-danko.shinyapps.io/undercountmigscores/ These data contain undercounting scores for emigration and immigration based on 30% metadata and 70% model scores.

    • Data on distance between countries from the CEPII database cepii.fr/CEPII/.

    Usage

    mig_data

    Format

    Each is a tibble with two variables and three observations

    Details

    mig_data are a data frame/tibble.

    Examples

    mig_data
#> # A tibble: 7,020 × 24
#>    SEX    Year Sending  Receiving Sendin…¹ Recei…² Sendi…³ Recei…⁴ Corri…⁵  Emig
